title: When can i make a pbe acc?
body: Guys can you tell me when i can make a pbe account cause i have the launcher but not a acc can someone tell me pls?

replies.body: You need to first apply for our PBE servers before you'll be able to create a PBE account. For the time being though, that signup page is [**down for maintenance**](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe). We're working on making the signup process smoother and easier for you guys. If you're still new to the PBE process, be sure to check out our [**PBE FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ) for all the details.
